# News comment title:
Walter Cronkite Awards Dub Jake Tapper, Jorge Ramos, and Katy Tur Best Reporters of 2016 Election

# Oldest comment (from the thread):
Give them all a necklace made from the pepperoni on the pizza. 

# Most liked comment (from the thread):
Walter Cronkite lied to America in the same way Jake Tapper, Jorge Ramos and Katie Tur are lying to America now.  Cronkite turned the American People against the war going on in Vietnam.  The Tet Offensive in 1968 was a decisive victory for the South Vietnamese government and its American support.  Cronkite with his commentary turned victory into an America defeat.  General Nguyen Giap the commander of the North Vietnamese communist military  in his memoir told of how at that point they had lost the war, but the actions of the Press back in America had given them time to recover from the losses.  There are tens of thousands of American names engraved on black granite slabs who might not have been there if Cronkite hadn't betrayed his country.  There are hundreds of thousands of we Veterans who know first hand the impact he had.  He is not looked upon with any respect.  The only people holding him in regard are those who continue his legacy.........."fake news!"

>>> COMMENT UNDER ANALYSIS<<<


More lefty awards by lefty organizations to lefty people for doing/saying lefty things. No reason to waste our important time even thinking about this nonsense. 

>>> END COMMENT <<<
